title: error downloading league of legends
body:
Hi, i have tried endlessly downloading league of legends, but the same error kept popping up:
"Error creating process... reason: advpack.dll"
and then it said that my visual c++ 2005 sp1 redistributable x86 mandatory prerequisite was not correctly installed.

replies.body:
I agree with *Oloferno*, your best bet is to uninstall all current versions of C++ 2005 on your PC, restart your PC, then install a fresh copy [here](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387). 

Let me know if this helped.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1474419 if you are unable to install the game with those then you should try to reinstall all of the visuall c++ you currently have installed on your pc.
